name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Careerflow AI Job Application Tracker, ATS Resume Checker, Autofill & more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Career Copilot: Profile optimization for LinkedIn, AI Cover Letters, Job Application Tracker and Autofill, ATS Resume Checker & more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Careerflow.ai is your AI Copilot for your career -- Optimize your LinkedIn Profile, use AI to generate cover letters, automate your job search by auto-fill applications and tracking them in a dashboard, and much more -- all in one!

Join hundreds of thousands of job seekers who use Careerflow to optimize and improve their job search and career journeys with AI! 

---------------------------------------
‚òÖ‚òÖ KEY FEATURES ‚òÖ‚òÖ
---------------------------------------

‚òÜ OPTIMIZATION FOR LINKEDIN PROFILE ‚òÜ

95% of recruiters use LinkedIn to find skilled employees and 47% of employers are less likely to contact candidates for an interview if they can't find them online. So it‚Äôs high time that you create a LinkedIn (LI) profile that leaves ever-lasting impressions on recruiters and hiring managers.

‚úì  Instant scoring of your profile from 0 to 100
‚úì  Use AI to rewrite your LinkedIn profile (Premium)
‚úì  Analyze each section for a personalized checklist
‚úì  Expert tips and easy-to-follow guides for each section of your profile
‚úì  Interactive Wizard to understand each and every section
‚úì  Quick actions and shortcuts


‚òÜ AI COVER LETTERS (Premium) ‚òÜ

83% of hiring managers reported that cover letters are important in their hiring decisions. However, it can take hours to get a hyper-personalized cover letter written uniquely for each job description. With our AI Cover Letter generator, it's as simple as one-click!

‚úì  One-click cover letters from 20+ career sites with auto-import job description
‚úì  Personalize using a Resume or your LinkedIn profile
‚úì  Re-generate as many times as you like until you are happy with the cover letter


‚òÜ JOB APPLICATION TRACKER (CRM) ‚òÜ

Never use a spreadsheet to keep track of your job applications again. Effortlessly organize and oversee your job applications spanning various online platforms. Our job monitoring system empowers you to stay updated on every aspect of your job search and prospects, irrespective of their source.

‚úì  Save jobs from 45+ job platforms including LinkedIn, Indeed, Monster, USAJobs, and more
‚úì  Automatically save Salary information, Recruiter contact, and details from the Job description
‚úì  Add notes, attach documents, and keep track of your job search in a Kanban board view
‚úì  Keep track of your tasks with todo lists for each application.

‚òÜ OTHER AI FEATURES (Premium) ‚òÜ

‚úì  LinkedIn Post Generator: Just tell us a topic and we'll write a custom LinkedIn post for you
‚úì  Job Description Summarizer: No need to read lengthy job descriptions, we'll summarize it in one click!
‚úì  LinkedIn About / Headline Writer: Follow our best practices for writing a LinkedIn headline and About section in one-click, following expert guidance and advice, using AI!

--------------------------------------------------------------
‚òÖ‚òÖ WHY USE THIS EXTENSION? ‚òÖ‚òÖ
---------------------------------------------------------------

‚úì Skip the hassle of reading 100s of blogs, and watching 10s of videos on ‚ÄúHow to optimize LinkedIn Profile‚Äù and use our extension's curated step-by-step guide instead.
‚úì Boost your search visibility by creating an optimized profile. Users report an estimated 2.5X improvement in "search appearances" after using this extension!
‚úì Prepare your profile for your dream companies and target roles in a fun and interactive manner. 
‚úì No more copying and pasting job listings, or losing track of where you found a particular job. With just the click of a button, you can save jobs to the Careerflow job search tracker.
‚úì Utilize AI to maximize your job search and save 10+ hours a week -- automated cover letters, summarized job descriptions, AI LinkedIn posts, and more!

---------------------------------------
‚òÖ‚òÖ HOW TO USE ‚òÖ‚òÖ
---------------------------------------

‚û°Ô∏è Click the ‚ÄúAdd to Chrome‚Äù button on this page.
‚û°Ô∏è Open your LI profile and you will find this extension‚Äôs icon on the right-hand side. It will also show up on any page which we auto-detect is related to jobs or careers. 
‚û°Ô∏è Click on this icon and sign in with your Google account. 
‚û°Ô∏è You are all set! 

-------------------------
‚òÖ‚òÖ FAQs ‚òÖ‚òÖ
-------------------------

üßê How is this different from Huntr Job Tracker?
‚û°Ô∏è Huntr only allows you to track jobs whereas the Careerflow chrome extension not only helps you monitor job postings from 45+ job platforms but also offers comprehensive LinkedIn Profile optimization to attract recruiters and hiring managers from top tech companies.

üßê How is this different from Teal - Free Job Search & Contacts Tracker?
‚û°Ô∏è Teal doesn‚Äôt provide a LinkedIn profile score for its users. Also as a result of using Teal, you have to endure advertisements on various websites. Moreover, its checklists are not dynamic and you may be asked to update your profile even if it‚Äôs already updated. On the other hand, the Careerflow extension provides you with best practices for each and every section, an interactive walkthrough, as well as a profile score from 0 to 100. 

üßê Is it free or paid?
‚û°Ô∏è  Most of the features are completely free to use, such as the LinkedIn Optimizer and the Job Tracker. We do have some Premium (paid) features that utilize advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) that require a cost to run and maintain, hence they are available for Premium users only. A majority of users are able to 2X their LinkedIn Profiles and keep track of their job search completely for free!
